item.title: Did you know that you can use basses as leads and for chords?
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
I’ve found that turning the high pass up just a hair on a bass im using as a chord helps it not to cancel out or mess up the actual bass line in the track
(Just a personally discovery, xD nothing special)
